document_data.name: Greeting of the Lord
document_data.mainbody: The '''Greeting of the Lord''' was a ritual observed by worshipers of [[Horus-Re]], the Lord of the Sun within the [[Mulhorandi pantheon]].
document_data.Description: The Greeting of the Lord was one of three daily rituals performed by [[priest]]s of Horus-Re. During the ritual Horus-Re was greeted each morning at sunrise with a series of prayers and chants.
